scripts.clone-dist: rm -rf dist; git clone -b gh-pages --single-branch git@github.com:peruukki/nhl-recap.git dist
scripts.commit-dist: cd dist && git add -A . && git commit -m "Version $npm_package_version"
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run clone-dist && npm run clean-dist && npm run copy-to-dist && npm run commit-dist && npm run publish-ready
scripts.publish-ready: echo 'Publish with these commands: cd dist && git push origin gh-pages'
